version_description:
- Now available in Simplified Chinese.
- Audio commentary read by Nicky Gumbel. Listen to Nicky's commentary as you read the bible.
- Start the Bible in One Year from any day of the year, not just the 1st January.
- New "Night" theme for low-light situations
- Multi-tasking support in iOS 9
- iPad Pro support
General bug fixes and performance improvements

NEW FOR 2017: BIBLE AUDIO
- Listen to each day with Nicky Gumbel’s commentary and David Suchet’s Bible readings
- Skip easily between chapters for each day

NEW FOR 2017: SPANISH, ARABIC & HINDI
- Daily commentary and Bible readings translated into Spanish
- Daily commentary and Bible readings translated into Hindi
- Daily commentary and Bible readings translated into Arabic
Fixes issues with new days not downloading automatically and general bug fixes
Fixes issues with new days not downloading automatically and general bug fixes
Resolves issues with audio passages skipping before the end as well as general bug fixes
Improvements to the audio player and bug fixes
Added language switcher within the app so that you can change the language of the  commentary text. Also includes​ other fixes and maintenance.

The app has been updated to provide additional content, an easy-to-use interface and added functionality.

New features include:

- An Express edition (10 mins) and a Youth edition of the Bible in One Year commentary
- Audio for Classic, Express and Youth BiOY editions
- New functionality allowing user to select which day’s commentary they would like to begin the plan from

Improved features include:

- New, intuitive and fresh design
- Updated audio player

Also includes other fixes and maintenance.

Fixed:
- Onboarding for users with Accessibility Font Sizes

Changed:
- App opens to List View instead of current devotion (swipe left or tap to begin daily devotion)
